name: TOOLS MANUFACTURER WEBSITE
shortDes: This website is about the manufacturer website, where customers can purchase tools with Stripe (Payment System) and Admin can control all the things.
des: Different UI and profile for Customer and Admin.
Customers can order any tools and can cancel any non-paid orders, add, pay with the Stripe payment system, and review on his/her particular paid order.
An admin can control all the things like Add Products, Manage Products, Manage All Orders, Manage Admin.

name: INVENTORY MANAGEMENT
shortDes: This website is about Inventory website where an authentic user can add or manage his/her products.
des: Logged In user can add or manage his products from My Items.
Logged-in users can Manage other users' products.

name: INDEPENDENT SERVICE PROVIDER
shortDes: This website is a photography website where a customer Book a particular service.
des: Logged In users can Book a particular service.
